scripts.init: npm run init:packages && npm run init:env && npm run init:ds && npm run init:api-auth && npm run stop:logto && npm run init:logto
scripts.start:services: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev --workspace=mock-api" "npm run dev --workspace=web" "npm run dev --workspace=payments" "npm run dev --workspace=messaging" "npm run dev --workspace=payments-api" "npm run dev --workspace=profile" "npm run dev --workspace=messaging-api" "npm run dev --workspace=profile-api"
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run start:docker && concurrently "npm run start:services" "sleep 5 && npm run migrate"
scripts.reset-docker: docker-compose down && docker system prune -a -f && docker builder prune -f && docker image prune -f
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate --workspace=web && npm run migrate --workspace=payments && npm run migrate --workspace=messages && npm run migrate --workspace=profile
